channel.title: Comments on: Kuri Goes to Sundance
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi there - Thanks! We're glad you enjoyed the video. We actually put Kuri on a custom-built pedestal for those interviews so that Kuri will stay in place but remain responsive (i.e. blinking, capturing moments, etc.). ;)
item.content:encoded: Hi there – Thanks! We’re glad you enjoyed the video. We actually put Kuri on a custom-built pedestal for those interviews so that Kuri will stay in place but remain responsive (i.e. blinking, capturing moments, etc.). 😉

item.title: By: Pops Rick
item.dc:creator: Pops Rick
item.description:
Nice work on the video !
Are we going to have to teach Kurri to stay off the end tables ? How he got up on them is amazing !!! lol
item.content:encoded:
Nice work on the video !

Are we going to have to teach Kurri to stay off the end tables ? How he got up on them is amazing !!! lol
